snippet: Indonesia has approved a two-year extension to a landmark ban on clearing primary rain forests and peatlands, an official said Thursday.
abstract: Indonesia approves two-year extension to landmark 2011 ban on clearing primary rain forests and peatlands; environmentalists praise move but say government must do more to curb production of greenhouse gases.
lead_paragraph: Indonesia has approved a two-year extension to a landmark ban on clearing primary rain forests and peatlands, an official said Thursday.

headline.seo: Indonesia: A Logging Ban Is Extended
headline.main: Indonesia: A Logging Ban Is Extended
headline.print_headline: Indonesia: A Logging Ban Is Extended
